step_feedback.feedback: Good job keeping your shoulders and elbows relatively stable. Focus on making your fists tighter and really engaging your muscles as you inhale.
Your shoulder and elbow movements are good. For the next repetitions, try to open your fingers wider and extend your arms a bit further out.
Your shoulders and elbows are well-controlled. Continue to focus on a full extension of your arms and a complete relaxation of your muscles as you exhale.
Good control of your shoulders and elbows. Ensure you are fully opening your fingers and relaxing your muscles during the exhale.
Your shoulder and elbow movements are generally good. Try to extend your arms fully and open your fingers as wide as possible during this step.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the horizontal pumping exercise! Remember to really tighten your muscles and make fists on the inhale, then fully extend your arms and relax on the exhale.
